generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and directional arrows, which is the primary surface for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are visible on the left side of the road, standing on a designated pedestrian area separated from the road by curbs and trees.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible, including a tall modern building with glass windows on the right and a white building with signage on the left.
- vegetation: Several trees are present along the sidewalks and in front of buildings, providing greenery.
- person: Pedestrians can be seen walking or standing on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road, and one black car is driving in the middle of the road.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, hanging above the road.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible on poles, including directional signs and parking signs.
- pole: Poles are visible supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the right side of the road, near the parked cars.
